Class MainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • view.GameComponent
            • view.MainWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class MainWindow
extends GameComponent
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener
    This is a class that just contains the MainWindow in one JFrame
    Version:
    2016-02-05
    Author:
    Gustav
    See Also:
